1.「おお <pc>。来てくれたか。| じつはな そちに 頼みがある。| これが 余: Oh <pc>. You came. I have a favor to|ask of you. This will be my last request...

2.「余の最後の頼みとは……| 我が祖国 ガテリア皇国を探す| 手伝いをしてほしいの: My last request is that you help me find my|homeland, the Kingdom of Gateria.

3.「……みなまで申すな。| ガテリアが すでに存在しないのは 重々承知。| しかし: Don't go so far. I am well aware that Gateria|no longer exists. But...

4.「ウルベア同様 朽ち果てた姿の……。| そう。ガテリア皇国の 遺跡ならば| 見つ: Like Urbea, it is in a state of decay... yes.|Perhaps the ruins of the Imperial Palace in|Gateria might help us find it?

5.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。| かつて 父上や母上 そして……| リウ老師と: I wanted to see. I wanted to see my homeland|as it is now, where I once lived with my|father, my mother and Master Liu.

6.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: There were those who were dear to me in the|throne room of my homeland. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

7.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て| ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てにあ:
From the location of the Urbea Underground|Ruins, the ruins of Gateria must lie to the|east of the Boronus Lava Flow in the far west|
|of this continent.

8.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。: <pc>! Find the ruins of Gateria and|lead me to the Throne Room. Will you please|grant me this last request?

9.「そうか！ やってくれるか！| 本当に…… 本当に| そちに 出会えて よかった: Yeah! You'll do it! I'm really... really glad|I met you!

10.「それでは ボロヌス溶岩流に行き| ガテリアの遺跡を探すとしよう。| 余は そち: Let's go to Boronus Lava Flow and look for the|ruins of Gateria. I will follow you.

12.「話を聞いてりゃ アンタ……。| 身寄りが いねえみたいですなッ！: From what I hear, you don't have any|relatives.

13.「もし 行くあてがねえんなら| 養子にでもしてやるでごぜえますよッ！| ここを: If you have nowhere else to go, I'll adopt|you! Think of this place as your home!

15.「カッ カン違いしねえでくだせえッ！| わしは アンタの その…ガラクタの知識を: Don't get me wrong! I'm just buying your...|crap knowledge!

16.「ダストン殿……。| 見かけによらず 貴公は 優しいのであるな。| その申し出: Mr. Duston... you are kinder than you appear.|I am indebted to you for your offer.

17.「……じゃが 余は 行かねばならぬ。| 祖国の今を 見届けねば 余の時間は| 止: But I must go. If I don't see my country now,|I feel as if time has stopped for me...

18.「<pc>よ。それでは 参ろうか。| 目指すは ボロヌス溶岩流の東に眠る| ガテ: <pc>. Shall we go then? Our goal is|the ruins of the Imperial Kingdom of Gateria,|lying to the east of the Boronus Lava Flow.

19.「……ムムッ！| そちは 他の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受け: Mwah! It seems you have too many requests from|others to accept my request.

20.「まあ こちらは 一刻を争うわけでもない。| 急ぎの依頼を 片付けたら| 余を: Well, we're not in a time crunch. If you|finish your urgent request, you can help me|out.

21.「……そうかえ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| そちの気が変わるまで 待つことに: I see. Then so be it. I shall wait until you|change your mind.

22.「おお <pc>。| 余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡を探す| 手伝いをしてくれる気: Oh <pc>. Are you willing to help me|find the ruins of my homeland, the Imperial|Kingdom of Gateria?

23.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。| かつて 父上や母上 そして……| リウ老師と: I wanted to see. I wanted to see my homeland|as it is now, where I once lived with my|father, my mother and Master Liu.

24.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: There were those who were dear to me in the|throne room of my homeland. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

25.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て| ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てにあ:
From the location of the Urbea Underground|Ruins, the ruins of Gateria must lie to the|east of the Boronus Lava Flow in the far west|
|of this continent.

26.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。: <pc>! Find the ruins of Gateria and|lead me to the Throne Room. Will you please|grant me this last request?

27.「余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡は| きっと この大陸の西の果てにある| ボロヌス: The ruins of my homeland, the Kingdom of|Gateria, must lie to the east of the Boronus|Lava Flow in the far west of this continent.

28.「余と共に ボロヌス溶岩流に行き| ガテリアの遺跡を見つけたら| 奥の玉座の間ま: If you go with me to the Boronus Lava Flow and|find the ruins of Gateria, please take me to|the throne Room in the back.

29.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: There were those who were dear to me in the|throne room of my homeland. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

30.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。| 頼んだぞよ <pc>。: This is my last request... please do me a|favor, <pc>.

31.「そちのおかげで ボロヌス溶岩流に眠る| ガテリア皇国の遺跡は 見つかったぞよ。: Thanks to you, we have found the remains of|the Imperial Kingdom of Gateria lying in the|Boronus Lava Flow. It's truly a thrill.

32.「あとは その奥にあるはずの| 玉座の間まで 余を 連れていってたもれ。: Then take me to the throne Room, which is|supposed to be behind the throne room.

33.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: There were those who were dear to me in the|throne room of my homeland. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

34.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。| 頼んだぞよ <pc>。: This is my last request... please do me a|favor, <pc>.

35.「おお……！ ついに……| ついに 見つけてくれたのじゃな……。| <pc>よ…: Oh...! At last... at last... you have found|me...

36.「かように 変わり果てても| 悲しいほど 余には わかるぞえ……。: I know how sad it is to see you so changed...

37.「まちがいない。| この地こそ 我が祖国ガテリアじゃ……。: I have no doubt. This is our homeland,|Gateria.

38.「祖国といえど 父上も母上も……| 親しい者は 皆 すでに ここにはおらぬ。|: Even in my homeland, my father, mother, and|all those close to me are no longer here. I|knew it, but it's still hard...

39.「……さあ <pc>。| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。| きっと こ: Come, <pc>. Take me to the Throne|Room. I'm sure it's in there.

41.「この部屋こそ 余の思い出が詰まった| ガテリア皇国の玉座の間……。| ついに:
This room, the throne room of the Imperial|Palace of Gateria, where I have so many|memories, is the place where I have finally|
|arrived.

42.「……こうしていると 在りし日のガテリアが| 目に 浮かぶようじゃ。: I can just picture Gateria in her glory days.

43.「……父上が 威風堂々と玉座に座ると| その隣で 母上が 余に笑いかけた。| そ: Father sat majestically on his throne, and|Mother sat next to him, smiling at me. And|then...

44.「決まった時間になると リウ老師が| 嬉しそうに 余を迎えにくる……。: At the appointed time, Master Liu happily|comes to pick me up...

47.「余が ここに来た 本当の理由は……: The real reason I'm here is...

50.「ど どこから わいて 出おった！？| かような お化けフンコロガシ……| 余の: Where did you come from? There's never been a|ghostly dung beetle in my Gateria!

51.「<cs_pchero> 頼むッ！！| 神聖な玉座の間を汚す 不届き者の| フン: <cs_pchero> Please! Strike down the infidel|dung beetle that defiles the sacred Throne|Room!

52.「よいか <cs_pchero>！| あの お化けフンコロガシを見かけたら| 次: All right, <cs_pchero>! The next time you|see that ghostly dung beetle, you'll show me|what you're made of!

54.「で 出たぁぁぁッ！！| 頼んだぞよ <cs_pchero>！！: And it's out! I'm asking you, <cs_pchero>!

55.「おお！ 不届きな お化けフンコロガシを| 見事 成敗してくれたようじゃな！|: Oh! I see you've successfully vanquished the|treacherous ghostly dung beetle! Well done,|<cs_pchero>!

56.「……かような化け物が すみつくとは| 本当に ガテリアは 時代から| 見捨てら: Gateria has truly been abandoned by the times,|that such a monster should linger here.

57.「……<cs_pchero>よ。| 今こそ 余が ここへ来た| 本当の理由を話そ: <cs_pchero>. Now is the time to tell you the|real reason I came here.

58.「余は……| ここで 自らの生を 終えようと思う。: I think... this is where I will end my life.

59.「止めないでたもれ……！| 大事な者たちとの思い出に ふれながら| この世を去る: Don't stop me. If I can leave this world with|the memories of those I cherish, then that's|what I want.

60.「そちには 本当に世話になった。| 心の底から 感謝してるぞよ。| では さらば: I am truly indebted to you. I thank you from|the bottom of my heart. Now, farewell...

63.「魔神兵……！？| なぜ あの魔神兵が ガテリアにおる！？: A Demon God Soldier...! Why is that Demon God|Soldier in Gateria?

64.「まさか リウ老師か！？| この中に リウ老師が入っておるのか！？| 早く… 早: It can't be! Master Liu? Is Master Liu in|here? Quickly... quickly, show me what's|inside!

67.「ふふふ……。やはり……な。| 魔神兵の中は もぬけのカラ……。| もう リウ老: Hmmm... as I thought... The inside of the|Demon God Soldier is empty... Master Liu is no|longer in this world.

68.「……これは リウ老師の手紙か！？| 老師が 余に 手紙を……！: Is this Master Liu's letter? Master Liu wrote|to me!

69.「……親愛なる我が主 ビャン・ダオさま。| リウにございます。: ...Dear Lord Byan Dao. My name is Liu.

70.「……ビャン皇子を魔神兵に乗せた後| 私は このガテリアまで 戻ってまいりました: After I took Prince Byan on board the Demon|Soldier, I came back here to Gateria. To keep|my promise to meet Prince Byan in the future.

71.「……しかし 私は 魔神兵に乗れなかった。| 皇子の後を追って 未来へ行くという: ...But I couldn't ride the Demon Soldier. I|couldn't choose the path of following the|Prince into the future...

72.「私は 文明に影を落とした 技術者のひとり。| その大いなる罪を つぐなうべく|:
I am one of those engineers who cast a shadow|over civilization. I have decided to end my|life in this age to atone for that great|
|crime...

73.「……皇子の生きる未来に| 正しい文明の姿を 取り戻すため| この身を賭して 戦: I have decided to fight with all my might to|restore civilization to its rightful place in|the future of the prince's life.

75.「ドワーフたちが 同じ過ちを繰り返したとき| あなたならば きっと 正しき道へと: When the Dwarves make the same mistake again,|you will be able to lead your people to the|right path...

77.「……ビャンさま。あなたが 成人したら| とっておきの技術を 教えるという約束を: Master Byan. Do you remember my promise to|teach you a very special skill when you come|of age?

78.「今こそ その約束を果たすとき……。| さあ 魔神兵の中に入っているモノを| お: Now is the time to fulfill that promise...|Now, please accept what is inside the Demon|Soldier.

80.「……かつて ドワーフたちは| 他の種族と同じく 自らの手で タネを植え| その: In the past, Dwarves, like other species,|planted their own seeds and rejoiced in the|harvest.

81.「……しかし 我らは 高度な技術におぼれ| 自らのチカラで 成しとげる よろこび:
However, we have become so addicted to|advanced technology that we have lost sight of|the joys of accomplishing things with our own|
|strength, of what true civilization is all|about.

82.「私が ビャンさまに託したかった技術とは……| 自らのチカラで 生き抜く術だった: The skill I wanted to entrust to Mr. Byan was|the art of surviving on one's own strength.

83.「ビャンさま…… どうか お元気で……。| あなたとの約束を守れなかった| 私め: Master Byan please be well and forgive me for|not being able to keep my promise to you.

84.「老師……。そなたは 何も わかっておらぬ。| 余が欲しかったのは こんな手紙で: Master you understand nothing. What I wanted|was not a letter like this, not a letter like|this.

85.「リウ老師……。余は ただ 一目だけでも| そなたに 会いたかったのじゃ……。: Master Liu I just wanted to meet you even if|it was only for one glance.

86.「……だが その思いは 受け取ったぞ。| リウ老師よ……。: But I have received your thoughts. Master|Liu...

87.「……そなたは 望んでおったのだな。| 技術に身をまかせた ゆがんだ時代を終わら:
You have longed for this. You wanted to end|the warped age of technology and for the world|to become exactly what it is today,|
|. I take that back. I have|decided to live in this time. I wanted to see|it. I could not have understood Master Liu's|
|teachings just by reading this letter. But now|I understand... because you and Chiri have|taught me the importance of living by our own|
|strength and not relying only on technology.|You and Chili taught me the importance of|living by our own strength...

88.「<cs_pchero>。そちには 本当に世話になった。| 感謝しても しきれぬ: <cs_pchero>. I am truly indebted to you. I|can't thank you enough, but this is the least|I can do. Please accept this.

89.「……余は これから リウ老師の教えに従い| 旅に出ようと思う。この手で タネを:
I will now embark on a journey following|Master Liu's teachings. With my hands, I will|plant seeds, and with my feet, I will find my|
|place.

90.「ふふふ……。そちたちのおかげで| 止まっていた余の時間が 動きだしたようじゃ。: Well... it seems that thanks to you, my time|to Move has come to a standstill. I'm so|excited to meet new people!

91.「それでは また会おう！ <cs_pchero>よ！| ガラクタ城の皆にも よろ: Well then, I'll see you again! <cs_pchero>!|Tell everyone at Junk Castle I said hi!
